item.title: Analysis of massive sentinel data using STAC and gdalcubes
item.description: Introduction Big thanks to Marius Appel who gave 2021 at OpenGeoHub Summer School 2021 a great workshop. This tutorial is an adapted version of it. Sentinel-2 is currently the most important platform for Earth observation in all areas, but especially for climate change, land use and ecological issues at all levels, from the upper micro level to the global level.
